meanings.definition: Extending to the greatest distance above the ground.
meanings.sent1: The highest mountain peak was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: She reached the highest shelf to get the cookie jar.
meanings.sent3: The cat climbed to the highest branch of the tree and couldn't get down.
meanings.sent4: His ambition soared to the highest heights, aiming for success.
meanings.sent5: The sun cast its highest rays at noon, shining brightly.

meanings.definition: Most extreme or greatest in amount or degree.
meanings.sent1: Her highest score in the game was a new record.
meanings.sent2: The highest building in the city could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's energy level was at its highest after a long nap.
meanings.sent4: The highest level of excitement filled the room as the surprise was revealed.
meanings.sent5: His highest level of determination led him to achieve his goal.

meanings.definition: Farthest from a given level or surface.
meanings.sent1: The highest cloud floated in the sky, far above the others.
meanings.sent2: The kite flew at its highest point before slowly descending.
meanings.sent3: The balloon reached its highest altitude before gently descending back to the ground.
meanings.sent4: The bird soared to its highest point in the sky, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent5: The rocket launched into the sky, reaching its highest altitude before returning to Earth.
